Stonehaven.Name: Stonehaven
Stonehaven.Description: A bustling town built from the very stones of the mountains. Its cobblestone streets are lined with merchants, and the air is filled with the scent of fresh bread and the sound of blacksmiths at work.

Whispering Woods.Name: Whispering Woods
Whispering Woods.Description: An ancient forest where the trees themselves seem to whisper secrets. Sunlight filters through the dense canopy, casting dappled shadows on the forest floor.

Crystal Cave.Name: Crystal Cave
Crystal Cave.Description: A subterranean wonder where walls are adorned with crystals that glow with an inner light. The air here is cool, and every step echoes in the silence.

Ancient Ruins.Name: Ancient Ruins
Ancient Ruins.Description: Remnants of a lost civilization, these ruins are steeped in mystery. Crumbling pillars and faded murals hint at the grandeur that once was.
